node.description: Cover Corp. CEO Motoaki Tanigo, known as “YAGOO” to his many fans and followers, made a surprise appearance at Crunchyroll Expo 2022.

node.title: Inugami Korone Teams Up with Sonic for Japanese Exclusive Sonic Frontiers Bonuses

node.description: Sega of Japan announced an exciting collaboration with Hololive’s very own Inugami Korone to provide incredible bonuses for fans of both the super-fast hedgehog and gamer dog for Sonic Frontiers, which is due to release on November 8th.

node.title: Hololive ERROR Available to Wishlist on Steam
